item.title: Npc drops..!? stupid.. !?
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

[quote=“For ( ; ; ), post:4, topic:128173”]if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { ItemHandler.addItem(####, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, #, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }[/quote]

So the #### are the item id’s ??

And [NPCID] has to be changed to the NPC id?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc drops..!? stupid.. !?
item.dc:creator: @LittleMaffia LittleMaffia
item.description:
@LittleMaffia wrote:

Open item2.java

Search for

[code]public static int runerock[] = {451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,1481,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451,451};

public static int randomRuneRock()
{
	return runerock[(int)(Math.random()*runerock.length)];
}

[/code]

Under the last } enter twince and add this:

[code]public static int NAME[] = {ITEMID,ITEMID,ITEMID};

public static int randomNAME()
{
	return NAME[(int)(Math.random()*NAME.length)];
}

[/code]

All the ‘‘NAME’’ Give them a same name!

Save and close.

Open NPCHandler and search for:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) {

Under the last } add this :

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPCID) // Give NAME the same name as in the item2.java and change NPCID { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomNAME(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

Compile, 0 errors , runserver.

Read full topic
